text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
translation: 做伟大工作的唯一途径是热爱你所做的事情。

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein
translation: 在困难的中间就是机会。

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde
translation: 做你自己，其他角色都已有人扮演。

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
translation: 成功不是终点，失败也不是末日，关键是继续前进的勇气。

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker
translation: 预测未来的最好方法是创造未来。

text: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon
translation: 生活就是你忙于制定其他计划时发生的事情。

text: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
translation: 不要看钟表，做它做的事——不停前进。

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu
translation: 千里之行，始于足下。

text: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha
translation: 我们所思即我们所成。

text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle
translation: 幸福取决于我们自己。

text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela
translation: 事情总是在完成之前看似不可能。

text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
translation: 别盯着钟看，要做它做的事，继续前进。

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
translation: 未来属于相信梦想之美的人。

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
translation: 你不投篮，百分百不会进球。

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
translation: 相信自己能做到，就已经成功一半了。

text: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan
translation: 敢于梦想，也敢于失败。

text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale
translation: 改变你的思想，就能改变你的世界。

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha
translation: 心即一切，你想成为什么，就成为什么。

text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali
translation: 别数着日子过，要让日子有价值。

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau
translation: 成功通常属于那些忙于努力的人。

text: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra
translation: 最好的报复就是巨大的成功。

text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman
translation: 永远朝向阳光，阴影就会落在身后。

text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser
translation: 机会不会自动出现，要靠自己创造。

text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill
translation: 别等了，时机永远不会完美。

text: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
author: Rosa Parks
translation: 多年经验告诉我，坚定的决心会减轻恐惧。

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
translation: 实现明天的唯一限制是我们今天的怀疑。

text: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
translation: 无论身处何地，都要尽力而为。

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis
translation: 你永远不会太老，无法设立新目标或追逐新梦想。

text: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
author: George Washington
translation: 冲突越激烈，胜利越辉煌。

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
translation: 我们身后和前方的事物，都比不上内心的力量。

text: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers.'
author: Amy Poehler
translation: 限制你的‘永远’和‘绝不’。

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain
translation: 成功的秘诀是开始行动。

text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill
translation: 悲观者在每个机会中看到困难，乐观者在每个困难中看到机会。

text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers
translation: 别让昨天占据太多今天。

text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don’t let it stop you. Failure builds character.
author: Unknown
translation: 失败比成功教会你的更多，不要被失败阻挡，失败塑造品格。

text: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi
translation: 关键不在于你是否被击倒，而是是否能站起来。

text: If you are working on something exciting, it will keep you motivated.
author: Unknown
translation: 如果你在做让你兴奋的事情，它会激励你前行。

text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown
translation: 伟大的事物永远不会来自舒适区。

text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown
translation: 梦想它，渴望它，去做它。

text: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown
translation: 成功不会自己找上门，你必须主动去争取。

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown
translation: 你为某事付出越多，达成时的成就感越强。

text: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown
translation: 不是累了就停，而是完成了才停。

text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown
translation: 带着决心醒来，带着满足入睡。

text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown
translation: 今天做点事，让未来的你感谢现在的自己。

text: Little things make big days.
author: Unknown
translation: 小事造就大日子。

text: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown
translation: 会很难，但难不等于不可能。

text: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown
translation: 别等机会，自己创造机会。

text: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown
translation: 考验不是让我们展现软弱，而是发现力量。

text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Unknown
translation: 成功的关键是专注目标，而非障碍。

text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown
translation: 梦想更大，行动更大。

text: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali
translation: 别放弃，现在受苦，未来活成冠军。

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill
translation: 成功是带着热情从一次失败走向另一次失败。

text: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown
translation: 你的限制只是你的想象。

text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown
translation: 推动自己，因为没人会替你做到。

text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown
translation: 伟大的事永远不会来自舒适区。

text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown
translation: 梦想它，渴望它，去做它。

text: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown
translation: 成功不会自己找你，你必须主动去追。

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown
translation: 你为某事付出越多，成功时的喜悦越大。

text: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown
translation: 不是累了就停，而是完成了才停。

text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown
translation: 带着决心醒来，带着满足入睡。

text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown
translation: 今天做点事，让未来的你感谢现在的你。

text: Little things make big days.
author: Unknown
translation: 小事成就大日子。

text: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown
translation: 会很难，但难不代表不可能。

text: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Unknown
translation: 不要等机会，创造机会。

text: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown
translation: 考验是为了发现我们的力量，而不是显示我们的弱点。

text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Unknown
translation: 成功的关键是专注于目标，而不是障碍。

text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown
translation: 梦想更大，行动更大。

text: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali
translation: 别放弃，现在忍受，未来活成冠军。

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb
translation: 种树的最佳时间是20年前，其次是现在。

text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates
translation: 未经审视的人生不值得过。

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs
translation: 你的时间有限，别浪费在过别人的生活。

text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington
translation: 如果你想提升自己，先帮助别人。

text: Do what you love, and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar
translation: 做你热爱的事情，金钱自然会跟来。

text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama
translation: 我们活着的目的就是幸福。

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West
translation: 人生只有一次，但活得精彩，一次就够了。

text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Unknown
translation: 如果想要伟大，别再请求许可。

text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar
translation: 实现目标得到的东西不如实现目标的过程中你成长的样子重要。

text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis
translation: 磨难常常使普通人走向非凡的命运。

text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson
translation: 相信自己和你的一切，相信你内心有比任何障碍更强大的力量。

text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair
translation: 你所有渴望的东西都在恐惧的另一边。

text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett
translation: 成功不是你爬多高，而是你对世界产生了多大积极影响。

text: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
author: Lewis Carroll
translation: 最终，我们只会后悔那些没敢尝试的机会。

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James
translation: 要像你的行动会带来改变一样去行动，因为确实如此。

text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston
translation: 你今天的努力可以改善你所有的明天。

text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
translation: 明天最好的准备就是今天尽力而为。

text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.
translation: 成功的秘诀是把普通的事情做得非凡。

text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney
translation: 如果你能梦想它，你就能实现它。

text: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett
translation: 别被脑海中的恐惧推着走，要让心中的梦想带路。

text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
translation: 伟大的人讨论想法，平庸的人讨论事件，狭隘的人讨论别人。

text: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom
translation: 最好的梦想是在你清醒的时候发生的。

text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela
translation: 生命中最伟大的荣耀不在于永不跌倒，而是每次跌倒后都能站起来。
